sentences.en: Every facility was laid on to ease their homecoming.
sentences.cn: 动用了一切设施以缓解他们的回乡之困。

sentences.en: He and Marcia shared a facility for languages.
sentences.cn: 他和马西娅都有语言天赋。

sentences.en: He paints landscapes with great facility.
sentences.cn: 他画起山水画儿来得心应手.

sentences.en: It is very useful to have an overdraft facility.
One of the new models has the facility to reproduce speech as well as text.
sentences.cn: 新型号中有一款具备复读和文本复制的功能。

sentences.en: Smell is a very basic sense but humans have lost much of the facility to use it properly.
sentences.cn: 嗅觉是一种非常基本的官能，但人类已经丧失了恰当使用这种官能的大部分能力。

sentences.en: The camera incorporates a redeye reduction facility.
sentences.cn: 这个相机有防红眼功能。

sentences.en: The child-care centre is a useful facility for working parents.
sentences.cn: 托儿所对有工作的父母来说是很有用的设施.

sentences.en: The H conversion code provides a facility for printing out characters.
sentences.cn: H换算码为打印出字符提供方便.

sentences.en: The problem lies in getting patients to a medical facility as soon as possible.
sentences.cn: 问题在于要把病人尽快送至医院。

sentences.en: The TMI nuclear facility has two reactors.
sentences.cn: 三哩岛核设施有两个反应堆.

sentences.en: This facility is open to both new and existing borrowers.
sentences.cn: 这套设备向新老借用者开放。

sentences.en: This facility is very effective because it is so simple to operate.
sentences.cn: 因为易于操作,所以单次撤销非常有效.

sentences.en: What recreational facilities are now available?
sentences.cn: 什么娱乐设施现在是可用的？

sentences.en: With this increase in the facility of reading, the reading public grew.
sentences.cn: 由于读书变得越来越方便, 读者的人数也随之增加.

sentences.en: Your camcorder should have these basic features: autofocus, playback facility, zoom lens.
sentences.cn: 你的便携式摄像机应该具备以下基本功能：自动聚焦、回放功能、变焦镜头。
